snippet: The World Trade Organization said trade in 2013 would be weighed down by the European debt crisis and recover only slightly in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The World Trade Organization said trade in 2013 would be weighed down by the European debt crisis and recover only slightly in 2014.

headline.seo: Global Trade to Be Weaker Than Expected, W.T.O. Says
headline.main: Global Trade to Be Weaker Than Expected, W.T.O. Predicts
